meanings.definition: In a cheerful and friendly manner.
meanings.sent1: She greeted her friends jovially at the party.
meanings.sent2: He always talks jovially to everyone he meets.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail jovially when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone jovially through the window, brightening the room.
meanings.sent5: The children skipped jovially along the path, full of joy.

meanings.definition: Showing high spirits or good humor.
meanings.sent1: The jovially clown entertained the audience with his jokes.
meanings.sent2: She had a jovially expression on her face throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat played jovially with a ball of yarn, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden swayed jovially in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: His jovially laughter filled the room with happiness.
